data.name: Don't Starve Together: Merrymaker Survivors Chest
data.detailed_description:
Merrymaker Survivors Chest

The cold chill creeping over the Constant won’t be enough to deter our Survivors from enjoying some good food with dear friends. Gather round the table and make merry in your finest festive frocks.

Season’s Feastings!

Includes
  • Maxwell's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Wes's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Wigfrid's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Winona's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • Woodie's Merrymaker Skin Set
  • WX-78's Merrymaker Skin Set

Merrymaker Survivors Chest

data.short_description: This Merrymaker Chest contains the complete survivors Merrymaker series. Contains skins for: Maxwell, Wes, Wigfrid, Winona, Woodie, and WX-78.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
